revision.text:
The '''GZDoom Strife Dialog Format''' is a variant of the [[ZDoom Strife Dialog Format]], which is in itself a variant of the [[Universal Strife Dialog Format]]. It primarily exists to allow for better management of larger, more elaborate conversation scripts.
==Changes from ZSDF== * '''Namespace:''' This ''must'' be set to "GZDoom" to switch from USDF or ZSDF to GZSDF.
== New Fields == === Page === * '''PageName''': Allows the specifying a name for a page, as opposed to the original automatic numbering. * '''Link''': Now allows you to specify a page to link to by its PageName. Old numeric page linking is still supported.
=== Choice === * '''NextPage:''' Now allows you to specify a page to link to by its PageName. Old numeric page linking is still supported.
==See also== * [[DIALOGUE]] * [[Universal Strife Dialog Format]] * [[ZDoom Strife Dialog Format]]
==External links== * [https://github.com/coelckers/gzdoom/blob/master/specs/usdf_gzdoom.txt GZSDF specifications] [[Category:Features]]
